title: Scooby-Doo! and Scrappy-Doo!
overview: Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo introduced another character to the cast: Scooby's nephew Scrappy-Doo, whose main purpose was to splat ghosts while the gang tries to run away from them.Â The seasons of this iteration of Scooby spanned several packages for TV like The Richie Rich/Scooby Doo Hour and The Scooby & Scrappy-Doo/Puppy Hour
